forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 58F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.
